item.title: SSH to VM hangs and takes a long time to log in
item.description: I am trying to learn ansible and I got quite frustrated at how long(15s) is it taking for my ubuntu vm to ssh into my centos vm. So to know why is it taking so i used ssh vagrant@ip_addr -vvv to print things in debug mode. The debug messages were these (trimmed ofc) debug1: Unspecified GSS failure. Minor code may provide more information No Kerberos credentials available debug1: Unspecified GSS failure.
